content.question: If legislation passes in both the House of Representatives and the Senate but each version is slightly different, the conflicting bills are sent to

choices.label: a standing committee of each house for a vote
an ad hoc committee for judicial review
the Rules Committee of each house for reconciliation and compromise
the majority and minority leaders of both houses for compromise
a conference committee for review and compromise

content.answer: a conference committee for review and compromise

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
